title: Fundamentals of Machine Learning-Based Vibration Neural Network Design

context.prior_knowledge: Basic physics, simple programming concepts, fundamental principles of neural networks
context.additional_context: Learners design and simulate vibration neural network models in VR environments, access materials, and submit assignments via LMS. Cultivates the ability to solve complex system design problems within social studies contexts

learning_goals: Learners can explain the basic structure and operational principles of oscillatory neural networks
Learners can simulate the process of optimizing junction resistance using the Backpropagation Through Time (BPTT) algorithm
A classifier can be developed using a machine learning-based vibration neural network to solve pattern recognition problems
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
